system.description:
“Naga are water and air serpent-spirits of protection, and are one of the dragonkind in the Sword Isles, the others being the Sawa earth-underworld serpents, and the Buwaya earth-water crocodiles. By brandishing a Jade Naga you create a spiritual boundary that prevents the targets of your hatred from inflicting violence.

Prereq: Gilded Kinnara

Spend 1 Beat to summon a Jade Naga: choose a path 3. Summon a Jade Naga on that path, a Durability 6 Object. The object is blocking terrain that cannot be climbed and cannot be shot over, as the naga now guards it. Push 1 any target in the chosen path away from the path.

Nagaraja: +1 Beat to exalt the naga, and now it swims: every end of your Fulmination, you may choose a new Path that is adjacent to at least one of the Naga’s squares. The Naga teleports into those squares.

Breathing Violence: +1 Beat to choose a square adjacent to one of the squares of the naga. That square becomes Fire Terrain for as long as it is adjacent to the naga, and cannot be changed.
